data.eml:eml: Pelvicachromis signatus and Pelvicachromis rubrolabiatus, two new cichlid species (Teleostei, Perciformes) from Guinea, West Africa.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anton Lamboj (2004): Pelvicachromis signatus and Pelvicachromis rubrolabiatus, two new cichlid species (Teleostei, Perciformes) from Guinea, West Africa. Zootaxa 454: 1-12, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:37FE7621-1C69-4306-B417-CF945B4D048D
